text.0:
Edited or misleading images are some of the most common kinds of misinformation found online, but they can sometimes be hard to spot.

We've collated some examples and advice on how to verify things you may encounter every day, so you don't get fooled.

https://t.co/uLU5ZVjliw
text.1:
The false claim examined in this article was sent to our new WhatsApp number by a Full Fact supporter.

If you get sent something that doesn't look right, you can forward it on to our team of independent, impartial fact checkers ► https://t.co/7GLGest4bh

https://t.co/FRbmwhSlvi
